text: ayana vaipunake mirandaru marali povalasi undi. Allah vagdanam nijamainadi. Niscayanga, ayane srstini modata sarikrottaga prarambhincadu, marala ayane danini unikiloki testadu. Idi visvasinci satkaryalu cese variki n'yayamaina pratiphala mivvataniki. Mariyu satyanni tiraskarincina variki - varu satyanni tiraskaristu undinanduku - tragataniki salasala kage nillu mariyu badhakaramaina siksa untayi
